backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with access control, storage mixins, and rich data types for referrals, intakes, beds, facilities, users, and status tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Specifies feature evidence for updating the public referral form's website field layout in PublicReferralPage.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend files including routing, dashboards, components, and hooks.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Outlines production deployment prerequisites and steps for the frontend and backend.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/SMOKE_TESTS.md: Provides manual smoke test procedures for validating production function, especially admin access behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth flow, admin checks, profile setup, public referral routing, and dashboard selection.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown to users awaiting approval with logout and guidance information.
frontend/src/components/AccessRequestsTa: Displays and manages pending access requests, allowing admins to approve with a principal ID or delete requests.
frontend/src/components/ActivityLogTab.t: Fetches and paginates activity log entries, formatting user, action, and entity data for display.
frontend/src/components/AdminBedUtilizat: Summarizes total, available, and occupied beds, including per‑program breakdowns.
frontend/src/components/AdminRiskOvervie: Shows a compact dashboard of at‑risk referrals, intakes, and beds, with navigation to detailed tabs.
frontend/src/components/AdminStatusCheck: Displays admin status, principal info, and list of all admin principals with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/BedsTab.tsx: UI for viewing, filtering, assigning, editing, archiving, and deleting beds, with admin-specific preferences persisted to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Displays referral, intake, and bed statistics with loading states and status badges, plus optional admin bed utilization data.
frontend/src/components/EmploymentTab.ts: Empty placeholder component with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/FacilitiesTab.ts: Manages facilities and bed creation, providing forms for adding facilities and beds with validation and max-bed limits.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer displaying attribution text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with branding, user info, theme toggle, and logout handling using identity and profile queries.
frontend/src/components/IntakesDataViewT: Displays a sortable intakes table with status, bed info, case manager data, and at-risk indicators.
frontend/src/components/IntakesTab.tsx: Manages intake creation, review, bed assignment, exit processing, notes, and status history with admin controls and data-view mode.
frontend/src/components/PartnerAgencyPro: Displays and edits a partner agency's profile with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/PartnerReferrals: Handles creating, listing, editing, and resubmitting partner referrals with validation and document upload.
frontend/src/components/PlacementEmploym: Allows staff to view and update a client's employment placement record, including status, employer details, and weekly check-ins.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to submit basic profile details before receiving access approval.
frontend/src/components/ReferralCountsSu: Computes and displays summary counts of referrals grouped by status.
frontend/src/components/ReferralsTab.tsx: Displays and manages referrals with filtering, sorting, status updates, history viewing, and admin actions. Includes dialogs, notes, request‑info workflow, and various referral utilities.
frontend/src/components/ReferralStatusBa: Renders a status badge with an icon, label, and variant based on referral status. Provides helper functions to map statuses to icons, variants, and labels.
frontend/src/components/RequestAccessFor: Form for creating an access request, validating fields, and submitting through a query hook. Shows a confirmation screen after successful submission.
frontend/src/components/StaffMyWorkTab.t: Shows intakes and referrals assigned to the logged‑in staff member, sorted by recent activity. Includes loading states, empty states, and date formatting helpers.
frontend/src/components/StaffOverviewCom: Compact staff dashboard summarizing referrals, intakes, and beds, including at‑risk items and navigation links. Computes several warning groups and availability counts.
frontend/src/components/StatusHistoryTim: Displays a chronological status history with labels, timestamps, and user info for referrals or intakes. Sorts entries newest‑first and formats variants and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/TrainingTab.tsx: Provides a UI for selecting a client and editing their training record, including status, track, checklists, and notes with save functionality.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementTa: Displays all users, separates pending and active users, and allows assigning roles via UI controls and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useNow.ts: Provides a timestamp that updates every minute for time‑sensitive UI displays.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, partner agencies, admin checks, and various records.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes across the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for overview, referrals, intakes, beds, facilities, access requests, users, and activity.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with optional access request form and informational section.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerDashboard.tsx: Partner dashboard providing tabs for referral list, referral submission, and agency profile management.
frontend/src/pages/PublicReferralPage.ts: Public referral submission form with validation, checkbox confirmation, and success state handling.
frontend/src/pages/StaffDashboard.tsx: Staff dashboard with tabs for overview, work tasks, referrals, intakes, beds, training, and placement.
frontend/src/utils/atRisk.ts: Utility functions determining at‑risk status for referrals, intakes, and beds, plus corresponding label helpers.
frontend/src/utils/bedTrackingPreference: LocalStorage-based load/save helpers for bed tracking preferences with validation and default fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/referralFilters.ts: Provides utilities to derive unique program names and filter referrals by program, status, and submission date.
frontend/src/utils/referralSort.ts: Sorts referrals by submission date or status with deterministic tie‑breakers.
frontend/src/utils/referralValidation.ts: Validates referral form fields, detects missing data, and formats user‑friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/referralWaitingTime.t: Calculates elapsed time since referral creation, formats waiting time, and checks if a referral is overdue.
frontend/src/utils/sortByUpdatedAt.ts: Sorts items by updatedAt with id tie‑breaking and provides helpers for referrals and intakes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and session‑stored parameters, including parsing, persistence, and cleanup helpers.
frontend/src/utils/userDisplay.ts: Resolves a principal to a display name using user records or a shortened principal fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theming, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current architecture, features, and known issues for Neighbors Light.
